thread.section_title: Hotel Eugene en Ville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect!!!
thread.title_full: Perfect!!! - Review of Hotel Eugene en Ville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: anonym489
title: Perfect!!!
text: Me and my friend stayed at Hotel Eugene en Ville from 17-20 march. It was fantastic, our room got upgraded. We had a huge terrace and a beautiful room, excellent for us. We loved the area, it was quiet and what we typical linked to Paris. The receptionists were so helpful and nice (can't remember their name:( ). The only minus, was that the room were a little bit too cold. We would really recommend.
